block.createcasing.brass_mixer.tooltip.s: Mixe _2x faster_ if the recipe has _only items_ than a normal mixer but _consumes_ more than a little _more stress_
Mixe _2x faster_ if the recipe has _only fluids_ or if the recipe is a _potion recipe_ than a normal mixer but _consumes_ more than a little _more stress_
block.createcasing.railway_mixer.tooltip: Mixe _2x faster_ than a normal mixer but _consumes_ more than a little _more stress_
createcasing.ponder.tag.encased_blocks.d: Components which added by Create Encased
createcasing.ponder.gearbox.text_1: Jumping between axes of rotation can get bulky quickly
createcasing.ponder.gearbox.text_2: A gearbox is the more compact equivalent of this setup
createcasing.ponder.gearbox.text_3: Shafts around corners rotate in mirrored directions
createcasing.ponder.mechanical_mixer.hea: Processing Items with the Mechanical Mixer
createcasing.ponder.mechanical_mixer.tex: With a Mixer and Basin, some Crafting Recipes can be automated
Available recipes include any Shapeless Crafting Recipe, plus a couple extra ones
Some of those recipes may require the heat of a Blaze Burner
The filter slot can be used in case two recipes are conflicting.
createcasing.ponder.mechanical_press.hea: Processing Items with the Mechanical Press
createcasing.ponder.mechanical_press.tex: The Mechanical Press can process items provided beneath it
The Input items can be dropped or placed on a Depot under the Press
When items are provided on a belt...
The Press will hold and process them automatically
